resources.string: The 15 puzzle, also known as the sliding puzzle, is a classic brain teaser that has entertained people for generations. Here is how to play:

A tray holds 15 numbered tiles in a 4x4 grid, with one empty space. - Slide the tiles around to arrange them in numerical order, from 1 to 15, with the empty space helping you move them. - It is a simple concept, but it can be surprisingly challenging!
Benefits of Playing: Sharpens your mind Improves hand-eye coordination Boosts patience and persistence Provides a fun mental break
